member.name: M:Barber.IoT.Api.Controllers.Devices.ManageController.Delete(System.String)
member.summary: Delete a device from data store

member.name: M:Barber.IoT.Api.Controllers.Devices.ManageController.GetById(System.String)
member.summary: Get stored device information, by given device id

member.name: M:Barber.IoT.Api.Controllers.Devices.ManageController.GetByName(System.String)
member.summary: Get stored device information, by given device name

member.name: M:Barber.IoT.Api.Controllers.Devices.ManageController.GetPage(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: List all stored devices. This method has pagination support.

member.name: M:Barber.IoT.Api.Controllers.Devices.ManageController.LockoutState(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Change lockout state for a given device

member.name: P:Barber.IoT.Api.Models.DeviceModel.ConcurrencyStamp
member.summary: A random value that must change whenever a user is persisted to the store

member.name: P:Barber.IoT.Api.Models.DeviceModel.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the primary key for this device.

member.name: P:Barber.IoT.Api.Models.DeviceModel.LockoutEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag indicating if the device could be locked out.
member.value: True if the device could be locked out, otherwise false.

member.name: P:Barber.IoT.Api.Models.DeviceModel.LockoutEnd
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time, in UTC, when any device lockout ends.
member.remarks: A value in the past means the device is not locked out.
